{{GeniusInvokationTCGTabs}}
'''Invitationals''' (or '''Invitation Duels''') are started by inviting players at the Invitation Board after reaching the required [[Player Level]] and using a {{Item|Match Invitation Letter}}. [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Diluc|Diluc]], [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Kaeya|Kaeya]], [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Sucrose|Sucrose]], and [[Genius Invokation TCG/Stage/Fischl|Fischl]] do not require a Match Invitation Letter.

Completing the {{Quest|A Guest From Liyue}} allows characters from anywhere in [[Teyvat]] to be invited, provided the Player Level is high enough. If ''A Guest From Liyue'' is not completed, [[Inazuma]] characters cannot be invited until {{Quest|Radiant Sakura}} is complete.
